author: tucu
msg: OOZIE-757 hive-contrib version should use hive.version (abayer via tucu)

author: jwross
msg: ARIES-825: Update subsystems to latest Subsystem, Resolver, and Repository APIs.
(1) Added support for osgi.wiring.bundle and generic capabilities in bundle content resources.
(2) Fixed an issue in ImportPackageHeader where the requirement filter was not generating correctly for versions.
(3) Fixed an issue in VersionAttribute where the attribute value was a String and not a Version.

author: adrianc
msg: More JSR-223 work - added a ScriptHelper object to the bindings. Also added a demonstration to the JavaScript test service.
